title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Coopers Rock State Forest, West Virginia
content:
Photo submitted byGary Rodosta, “A cold, snowy day in Morgantown, WV, meant perfect conditions for a fat bike ride at Coopers Rock State Forest.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers aroundÂ the world here on the Pic Of The Day.
